job_description: Position:  Field Operations Engineering Co-opCompany:  Tantalus Systems Corp.Terms:   From May 2015 - Would like a Coop that can do 2 terms back to backWe are seeking an Electrical Engineering or Computer Science Co-op Student to join the Field Operation team.  The Level 2 support team for Field Operations is the team that maintains our customer networks and provides Engineering Support in the analysis of customer product issues. The co-op role in this team will include1. Data Analysis and issue investigation.• Consolidate data from  many reports to correspond with system events or device problems and to analyze system data to find trends and particularities and depending on findings search for extra data that further depicts what was found and to summarize findings clearly and precisely• Work with Project Manager and System Engineers to attain data needed to fully capture a situation2. Presenting and Writing Reports based on  Data Analysis findings• Create and update issue entries in Process Management System based on outcomes of data analysis and provide clear and sufficient information so that others can work on the issue with a full understanding of the problem• Generate graphs and charts as well as individual examples to present to Product Development and Senior Management3. Summarizing Daily Reports• Perform daily tasks involving summarizing multiple reports that track system performance or status of certain devices4. Upgrade Planning and support• Coordinate with Project Managers and System Engineers to set up dates with customers when they are available to perform the network system software upgrade• Plan and coordinate with System Engineers and Shipping to do preparatory work well ahead of time so the upgrade can be performed smoothly5. Updating records• Update Customer Network Management information to correspond with changes in the field and by upgrades• Update documents to be given to customers so that current information is provided6. Automation of the Report generation used in the data analysis
job_requirements: Experience Required:1. MicroSoft applications: Excel (Pivot Tables, Data Importing, Formulas) , Outlook, Visio (an asset)2. Linux/Unix Scripting using bash or perl to mine log filesPersonal Attributes Required:1. Problem solving and strong Analytical skills -  an ability to easily and quickly pick out trends from data2. Ability to simply summarize findings in a visual format using excel3. Strong verbal and written communication skills in English.4. Good interpersonal skills including: teamwork, respect & courtesy.Experience Desired:1. linux command line bash or shell programming 2. C, Java, or Perl,Additional constraints1. NSERC funding eligible2. 2nd, 3rd or 4th year student3. Computer Science or Electrical Engineering disciplineOpen To All Majors:No
